feature_model.name: payee23
feature_model.feature_tree: :r payee23 (payee23) :m insured_object2 (insured_object2) :m conditions17 (conditions17) :m payment13 (payment13) :m exception19 (exception19) :m coverage7 (coverage7) :m acceptance18 (acceptance18) :m insurance_product1 (insurance_product1) :m premium20 (premium20) :o own_risk16 (own_risk16) :g [1, *] : loss (loss) : unemployment10 (unemployment10) : damage (damage) : illness (illness) : life9 (life9) :g [1, *] : payee_corporation (payee_corporation) : person224 (person224) :g [1, 1] : ammount15 (ammount15) : service14 (service14) :g [1, 1] : realty4 (realty4) : corporation (corporation) : movable_property (movable_property) : person (person) :g [1, 1] : periodical22 (periodical22) : direct21 (direct21)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~loss or movable_property constraint_2:~corporation or payee_corporation constraint_3:~person or ~damage constraint_4:~illness or ~corporation
